Gardening

I like gardening, it brings peace of mind while also being a quite good way to stay in shape. In recent years I unfortunately do not have much time for visiting my old garden, so I ttry to grow at least some herbs on my balcony.

    Our giant, almost 2 kilogram weighing kohlrabi.
